entities.name: cabinet
entities.description: The Cabinet is described as something that can travel between the school and the shop. It's also mentioned that it's broken.

entities.name: borgin and burkes
entities.description: Borgin and Burkes is a shop where the Death Eaters were able to pass into the school.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a place that can be accessed through the Cabinets.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as someone who praises the plan and seems to know what's going on.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who draws courage from Dumbledore's praise.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are described as people who were able to pass into the school through Borgin and Burkes.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters were able to pass from Borgin and Burkes into the school.
The Death Eaters were associated with Borgin and Burkes.
There could be a way into Hogwarts through the Cabinets.
